Terms of use https://www.gmindia.tech/terms-conditions/ Privacy Policy https://www.gmindia.tech/privacy-policy/ Skip Camera Gallery Turn your phone into a portable scanner! \nCapture receipts, contracts, notes, and \nmore with just a tap. Scan Documents Effortlessly Capture IDs in Seconds Perfectly scan ID cards and Business cards. \nSave time while ensuring accuracy for all \nyour important documents. Organize Your Library Digitally Effortlessly scan ISBNs to retrieve book \ndetails, organize your library, or manage \ninventory with precision. Quick, accurate, \nand reliable. Email address Password Remember me Full Name or sign in with Authentication with Google Authentication with Facebook Authentication with Apple Authentication with LinkedIn 0 Submit Resend Code email@domain.com Enter the code we have sent to your email Enter Verification Code Version 1.0 - Feb 24, 2025 About App Rating Share GMScan Logo GMScan About GMScan App is a document scanning application designed for efficient and accurate scanning of IDs, documents, and books. It allows users to capture, process, and store scanned files with ease. The app includes features like automatic edge detection, high-quality image processing, and seamless integration for digital documentation.
